heading: 1 Introduction
text:
website serves repository data management SOPs used
within Northwestern University Mesulam Center Cognitive Neurology &
Alzheimer’s Disease.

heading: 1.1 How to Use the Site
text:
Navigate SOPs Table contents left panel. Navigate chapters
within SOP right panel. Search specific SOP using search
bar located Table contents left panel.

heading: 1.1.1 Navigating Pages
text:
Navigate next SOP clicking next page button bottom 
text.Navigate previous SOP clicking previous page button 
bottom text.

heading: 2.1 Creating a New Data Request
text: Navigate ‘Mesulam Center Data Requests’ database REDCap.‘Data Collection’ tab left panel, select ‘Add/Edit Records’.Click large green ‘+ Add new record’ button. create new Record ID allow select ‘Data Request’ ‘Status’ Instruments.

heading: 2.3 Fill out the Status Instrument
text:
Select Status Instrument button Data Collection Instruments.creating data request, select appropriate status.Enter Percent Complete.

heading: 2.4 Completing the Data Request
text: Data Request Forms completed REDCap, pull required data.Save files corresponding Data Request folder.Data Request Collaborative Application, create Collaborator folder within Data Request folder. Store files shared Collaborator within Collaborator folder. access specific folder, entire Data Request folder.Create Data Dictionary – stored Collaborator folder one; otherwise, can stored general folder Data Request. See Step 3 steps create data dictionary.

heading: 2.5 Creating the Data Dictionary
text:
Note: Data Dictionary store variables specific Data Request information . step completed internal data requests collaborative application data requests inform receiver data variables.database used Data Request, navigate corresponding ‘Dictionary’ page can found left panel REDCap.
Data Dictionary page, select ‘Download current Data Dictionary’. .csv file variables database downloaded. Open downloaded file.Filter Data Dictionary delete unneeded variables data request.Save final Data Dictionary, now consists variables required Data Request, Data Request folder Collaborator folder (Collaborative Application).one database used Data Request, repeat steps 1 – 4 database. heading: 2.6 Documenting the Data Request
text:
purpose data documentation Data Request explain everything done. include:data pulled – databases used; specify data pulled via REDCap report, API, method.data pulled – variables pulled database.done data pulled – additional filtering sorting, adding comments/variables, calculations, etc.. documentation consists sentences short paragraphs, can entered directly Data Request Form Documentation textbox.
B. documentation requires longer explanation, create word document paste link documentation Data Request Form Documentation textbox.
